Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: @TwilightPunkster K64 Can you explain what this is for us? It looks interesting so far!

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: I only know parts of the idea here so far. ğŸ˜‰

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: @Cryptofist that is an independent Unity RPC client for Komodo.

Author: Cryptofist#7504
Content: So it's for Unity to interact with komodo, correct?

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: What this one is doing is requesting the data from cclib (crypto conditions smart contract that allows custom logic, in this case from Rogue) and returning a response in JSON which can be used in any possible way.

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: It demonstrates that Unity can deal with Komodo easily.

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: Now, probably the first use case for game development will be to interact with TokenCC, which is essential for Asset Chain.
